function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Permanent work from home policies and relocation due to work from home options may lead to changes in population distribution and density, impacting the spread of contagious diseases in different geographical areas.","category":"Social","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lax adherence to safety protocols leading to surge in covid-19 cases","category":"Economic","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Slow vaccine rollout leading to low vaccination rate","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective data integration and sharing","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective contact tracing systems","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to adopt iot for test and trace applications","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of technological infrastructure for effective test and trace applications","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Acceleration of adoption of telehealth and home care","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of iot and related technologies in healthcare sector","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Confinement measures and tracking of covid-19 patients using gps and other tools","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of wearable devices and self-reported symptoms for covid-19 detection","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Accelerated deployment of iot technologies in healthcare","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of handheld and portable ultrasound solutions for covid-19 patients","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Integration of covid-19 identification systems into wearables may lead to a false sense of security and reduced adherence to other preventive measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on ai-based diagnosis for contagious diseases may lead to algorithmic biases and inaccurate identification","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privacy concerns and data security risks associated with the collection and transmission of sensitive health data from wearables to cloud systems","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased demand for wearables due to covid-19","category":"Economic","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Acceleration of iot adoption in healthcare sector due to covid-19","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased use of wearable devices for tracking and contact tracing during covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of covid-19 due to extensive interviewing and interaction with people from various companies and organizations","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential exposure to covid-19 during extensive literature review and database searching","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unidentified health and safety protocols during interactions with interviewees from various companies and organizations","category":"Health & Safety","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased reliance on remote work and telehealth leads to higher risk of contagious disease propagation through increased interaction in the built environment.","category":"Health & Safety","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased reliance on technology for essential social interactions may lead to decreased in-person social connections, which can impact mental health and well-being.","category":"Social","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shift towards technology-driven future may lead to increased cyber security risks and vulnerabilities, especially with the collection and sharing of personal and sensitive data for remote transactions and interactions.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of effective ai-based approaches for eradicating pandemics","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Financial stress impacting technology adoption in the short-term","category":"Economic","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of user cooperation in contact tracing","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Privacy and security risks in iot data sharing","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Barriers in adopting iot-based healthcare","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure to covid-19 through iot devices and technologies","category":"Health & Safety","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of data security in iot devices used for covid-19 management","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on iot technology for disease management and control","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Focus on iot in different sectors impacted by covid-19 may overlook specific health risk mitigation strategies.","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Less strict stance on privacy issues","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Stricter cleaning and tracking requirements for businesses","category":"Health & Safety","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Recession impacting automotive companies’ ability to invest in iot initiatives","category":"Economic","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Slow adoption of iot technology","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on digital transformation","category":"Economic","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of indicators in global green building certification and rating systems to address pandemics","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited consideration of certification and rating systems and focus on environmental and social sustainability only","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Propagation of viruses through touch surfaces and shared spaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate wastewater management leading to virus propagation","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient energy use and lack of backup energy sources","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of response to preventing virus propagation pvp2 in the health & safety category","category":"Health & Safety","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Missed responses to mental health mh2 and mh3 in the health & safety category","category":"Health & Safety","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of response to wastewater management wwm1, wwm2, wwm3 in the health & safety category","category":"Health & Safety","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of pathogens through air and water systems","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of pathogens through wastewater and waste management","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate outdoor and activity spaces leading to poor mental health","category":"Health & Safety","confidence":"Medium"}]}
